Company name: National Crime Records Bureau, Ministry of Home Affairs
Qualifications required: Matriculation from a recognized board; 2 years experience in examination of finger print; eligibility for deputation as per specified pay scales and service conditions
Age limit: Maximum 56 years as on the closing date of receipt of applications
Salary or compensation details: Level-3 in Pay Matrix (Rs. 21700-69100/-) with pre-revised Pay Band-1 (Rs. 5200-20200/-) and Grade Pay Rs. 2000/-
Mode of application: Offline (prescribed proforma with documents sent to Assistant Director (Admn.), NCRB, New Delhi)
